agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Nominations TIME & DATE: 9:00 AM Thursday, April 11, 2019 PLACE: 2E.20 (Betty King Cmte. Rm.) CHAIR: Senator Dawn Buckingham __________________________________________________________________________________ To consider the following: Pending Business from the Thursday, April 4, 2019, meeting, as well as, the posted agenda. The following nominees will appear: Office of Public Utility Counsel Lori Ann Cobos Appointed 03-22-19 for a Watson Travis County term to expire 02-01-21 Governing Board of the Texas Indigent Defense Commission Alexander Bunin Appointed 03-20-19 for a Alvarado Harris County term to expire 02-01-21 Texas Facilities Commission William R. Allensworth Appointed 01-22-18 for a Watson Travis County term to expire 01-31-21 Texas Real Estate Commission Russel S. Kesner Appointed 03-12-19 for a Rodríguez El Paso County term to expire 01-31-25 State Office of Administrative Hearings Kristofer S. Monson Appointed 03-22-19 for a Campbell Hays County term to expire 05-15-20 The following nominees will not appear: Automobile Burglary and Theft Prevention Authority Miguel Angel Rodriguez Appointed 10-31-18 for a Zaffirini Webb County term to expire 02-01-23 State Bar of Texas Alan E.
